reviews.review_msg: Little should not be allowed to teach, worest history prof ever!

WORSE PROFESSOR AND CLASS EVER! If you have ANY problems with your writing avoid him. His expectations is that you should share his views on the subject and will throughly tear apart your argument if you disagree with him. He also has a very limited idea of landscape and if your definition doesn't fit his good luck. I would avoid taking his class!
Very Dry and Boring. Want's to hear exactly what he says. Not very helpfull overall. I will be avoiding classes with  him.

If you are thinking of taking a class with this professor take my advice... Don't do it! Reconsider if you want to actually get something out of the classes you are taking. He's the most uninteresting professor at this university.  He should stick to being a historian and never teach again!
Don't take him EVER!! Unless you really want someone to destroy your self-esteem and make you sleep. After his class I wanted to leave History for good. Still can't believe he still teaches.

Okay,now let's be fair to Jack. I took Friday MORNING seminar with him and managed to get through without falling asleep once. Dr. Little made himself totally available to giving us help on our term papers, so I think it's fair he marks a bit hard. This guy knows his stuff, just don't expect him to be Will Ferrell or something, and you'll do fine.
No Comments

why do some historians become teachers? this is the question i asked myself while trying to endure this class, worse prof i have had at SFU he changed his essay topic everytime you asked him and the topic was very unclear, then marked it very hard and was extremly rude about it, Little has not heard of constructive criticism, dry lectures, painful

This is the worst prof I have ever had.He changed the essay topic two days before it was due.There is a huge difference between constructive criticism and just plain rude & opinionated critism.I do not recommend this prof.Avoid at all costs.I was warned about this prof & didn't listen:(

Nice guy, but absolutely brutal lecturer!  Bring yourself some coffee, redbull...whatever it takes to stay away and follow!  When you write a paper make sure you know exactly what he wants to hear because your opinion doesn't count, and will actually hinder your mark.  BRUTAL!!!!!!!!!!!!!
No Comments

I LOVE Canadian history, hated his class.  He picks favourites, listens to the men but is argumentative with the women.  Changed his mind about final paper criteria AFTER papers were handed in.  Boring, arrogant, empiricist, ****, old school.  How did he become chair???Avoid him if possible!
No Comments

Dr. Little is a brilliant historian who cares passionately about his work and his students.  I suspect that the majority of negative responses posted below are authored by students who have no interest in Canadian history except to the extent that it is a requisite of the PDP program.

Jack... stick with research and heading the department then having lectures and teaching classes. I never wanted to drop out of a class more in my life. If you do take him, never take it an evening class because you so want to skip it when he speaks (monotone). Very tough marker on papers with very
Why is he Department Head!?! I've never fallen more asleep in my entire life.  He has a very boring voice and is incredably arrogant.
A teacher that can take you to the marrow of the history you are learning.

Made me want to give up on a history major! Not approachable. To get an A you need to suck-up alot and do 10times the work then the rest of the class. Waste of time. Bad lecturer. Knows his stuff but is so damn COCKY!!!

Worst lecturer and toughest marker in hist dept. Unless ur a honors hist major or someone with an amazing english writing background, also willing to stay up for boring lectures from a monotone voice and willing to be intimidated by his closed personality...then take him! he is not approachable.

Worst prof I've ever had.  It's terribly disturbing that he's the department head.  Brutal assignments, useless readings, and he often goes out of his way to insult the class, embarassing students who do poorly.  A disaster!
Painful lectures and tutorials. Does not like undergrad papers. Unapproachable and not necessarily helpful. If your a keener, you'll do well. Do not expect encouragment.

Great prof., definately one of the best. He's extremely knowledgeable and helpful. You'll walk away from the class having improved not only your knowledge of Canadian history, but also yourskills as a historian.Just be prepared to work hard for your mark.
THE WROST PROF I HAVE EVER HAVE!!!!! Too hard and UNAPPROACHABLE!!! I will NEVER take a class with Jack again. Avoid at all costs!!!!!!!!!!!!!
One of the best profs in SFU's history dept.
His have to be the driest lectures on record, but he knows the subject backwards and forwards. And he's more than willing to help out any student who asks. Just don't expect a smile.
an expert in his field...but class way too boring
Very interesting and knowledgable in his filed of expertise and at an upper division level he is an excellent teacher and mentor for his students.
No Comments
zzzz.....knows his stuff inside out, but nobody cares if it's not intersting. Doesn't like 1st year's papers - watch out!
Simply painful...
Needs to liven things up!
zzzzzzzzzz is right!!
He is boring and boring and boring.
Unenthusiastic, needs to work on public speaking. Nice guy otherwise.
zzzzz
